rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Kirk, Kazuna, and Mark'll be off to
school in Acedia starting next year...

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I do wonder how they'll get on. It's the
bullying I'm worried about, mostly.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I know, I know. They won't be gone for
a while yet. Still...

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0004
rows.name:
I think of those boys as my own flesh
and blood. I can't help but worry.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Rex! You're back sooner than
I expected.

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Now don't you keep those ladies
waiting!

rows.label: tlk001901_04_msg0009
rows.name:
Grab your things and off you go!
Quick-quick! Get a move on!
